articles.title: Greetings to Djiboutian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Djiboutian President
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Ismail Omar Guelleh, president of Djibouti, on the 35th anniversary of its independence.
					Kim in the message heartily wished the friendly Djiboutian people progress and prosperity and the president success in his work.

articles.title: Printing Factory Jointly Established by DPRK, China
articles.content:
Printing Factory Jointly Established by DPRK, China
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Korea Printing Factory of Tongbaek Printing Joint Venture Company was commissioned with due ceremony here on Monday.
					The factory is a red camellia in full bloom in the flower garden of DPRK-China friendship, Choe Kyong Guk, director and editor-in-chief of the Foreign Languages Publishing House of the DPRK, said at the ceremony.
					
					The factory was jointly established by the Foreign Languages Publishing House of the DPRK and the Oriental Yongli Hong Kong Int'l Investment Co., Ltd. and Jiangsu Zhongcai Printing Co., Ltd. of China.
					
					The factory will produce and sell varieties of printed materials and trademarks in the DPRK.
					
					The factory will also receive orders from international market.
					
					Choe expressed the will to strictly implement all agreed points through friendly negotiations on the principle of equality and reciprocity guided by the DPRK Law on Joint Venture, its enforcement regulations and other related laws.
					
					The factory will ensure credit and profit in its operation and make signal contribution to the printing development of the country, he declared.
					
					The two-storied factory is furnished with production equipment on the first floor and facilities for inspection of products and offices on the second floor. 
					
					It is located in Sosong District, Pyongyang.

articles.title: Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Agricultural and Forestry Workers Union of China led by Wang Junwei, vice-president of its National Committee, visited Mangyongdae.
					Members of the delegation were briefed on the revolutionary life of President Kim Il Sung and his family members, looking round the historic relics preserved there with care.
					
					They went round the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					At the end of the visit the head said as follows:
					
					I was deeply moved to visit Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					The President dedicated all his life to Korea's liberation and prosperity and the people's happiness. 
					
					His family members were ardent patriots who devoted themselves to the country's independence.
					
					The delegation also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph, the Friendship Tower and Pueblo, a U.S. armed spy ship displayed in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Swedish Parliamentarians Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Swedish Parliamentarians Delegation Arrives in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Swedish parliamentarians from the ruling coalition parties led by Johan Linander, member of the Executive Committee of the Centre Party of Sweden who is vice-chairman of the Judicial Affairs Committee of the Parliament, arrived here on Wednesday.

articles.title: Swiss Delegation Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
Swiss Delegation Tours Pyongyang
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Christian Democratic People's Party of Switzerland headed by Rene Imoberdorf, member of the Council of State from the party, Wednesday visited the e-library of Kim Il Sung University.
					They went round halls and rooms at the e-library, being briefed on the fact that it was built as a good education, science and information service center.
					
					They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, International Friendship Exhibition House, Pyongyang Hosiery Factory, Kyongsang Kindergarten and other places.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greeting from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greeting from Mexican Party Leader
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on June 19, the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee. 
					The message extended greatest respect to him in the name of all the party members on the significant day. 
					
					It said that Kim Jong Il was a world-famous veteran statesman who successfully led the revolutionary cause of Juche started by President Kim Il Sung and performed great exploits for global peace and stability. 
					
					It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un big success in his noble work of leading the revolutionary cause of Juche and global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greetings from Tajikistan Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message of Greetings from Tajikistan Party Leader
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greetings from Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, on June 18 on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee. 
					The message said that all the party members highly praise the great exploits performed by Kim Jong Il for the world communist movement. 
					
					He wisely led the party and government of the DPRK while working at the C.C., the WPK in the past, the message said.
					
					It congratulated Kim Jong Un on the occasion and wished him greater success in his work for accomplishing the revolutionary cause.

articles.title: Preview of DPRK-China Co-Produced Film "Promise in Pyongyang" Held
articles.content:
Preview of DPRK-China Co-Produced Film "Promise in Pyongyang" Held
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A preview of the DPRK-China co-produced film "Promise in Pyongyang" took place at Taedongmun Cinema on Wednesday.
					Present there were Pak Chun Nam, vice-minister of Culture who is director of the General Bureau of Film, officials of ministries, and movie creators and artistes, media reporters and editors.
					
					Attending it were members of the Chinese film delegation headed by Tong Gang, director of the film management bureau of the Chinese State Administration of Radio, Film and Television, Ambassador Liu Hongcai and staff members of the Chinese embassy here, Chinese people staying in the DPRK and Chinese students studying here.

articles.title: Implementation of North-South Joint Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of North-South Joint Declarations Called for
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian paper dedicated an article to the 12th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration while a Brazilian organization posted an article on its Internet homepage to mark the occasion.
					The Indonesian paper The First Times carried an article titled "June 15 for reunification" on June 14. It said that the joint declaration reflecting the desire of the nation for reunification was published in Korea thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The joint declaration calls for achieving the reunification of the country and the co-prosperity of the nation in the basic idea of "By the Korean nation itself", the article noted, and went on:
					
					The joint declaration aroused full support and sympathy of the whole Korean nation. After the publication of the declaration the north and the south made common achievements in various fields in their efforts to give priority to the desire of the fellow countrymen and the interests of the nation.
					
					The October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing the joint declaration, was adopted in 2007, opening up a brighter prospect for achieving the Korean nation's cause of reunification. But the Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea has totally denied the joint declarations agreed between the north and the south since it came to power.
					
					The south Korean people are now cursing the Lee group, which has plunged the north-south relations to complete deadlock and created an atmosphere of war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					There are increasing voices abroad for supporting the joint declarations and calling for their implementation.
					
					The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on June 12 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Immovable banner for Korea's reunification". It said the joint declarations were adopted between the north and the south of Korea, opening up a bright prospect for reunification.
					
					Laying bare the crimes the Lee group committed by deliberately straining the tension on the Korean Peninsula as a henchman of the U.S., the article stressed there is no other way but to implement the joint declarations for the reunification of Korea.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Cover up Its True Colors as Provocateur of Korean War (1)
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Cover up Its True Colors as Provocateur of Korean War (1)
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- It is 62 years since the U.S. ignited the Korean War.
					The Korean War ignited by the U.S. on June 25, 1950 imposed unspeakable misfortune and sufferings on the Korean people, causing tremendous human and material losses.
					
					The U.S. has, however, falsified the truth of history and persisted in its moves to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					This is a foolish act to evade the responsibility as the provocateur of the Korean War and realize its wild ambition for domination.
					
					Historical facts bring to bolder relief the true colors of the U.S. as provocateur of the Korean War and a war criminal.
					
					The Korean War was an inevitable product of the U.S. strategy for putting the world under its control. 
					
					It was pursuant to the U.S. foreign policy for aggression and its direct result.
					
					The U.S. set it as an immediate strategic goal of its foreign policy to establish "leadership over the world" and dominate the world by taking advantage of its favorable position in which it emerged the boss of the imperialists after the end of World War II.
					
					U.S. President Truman in his "message" sent to Congress on December 19, 1945, said that at last it became possible for the U.S. to get the leadership position which U.S. President Wilson had wished to grant to it after the end of World War I, adding that it should assume with pleasure the mission to "lead the world".
					
					In order to realize its wild ambition to dominate the world the U.S. declared the Cold War against the growing socialist countries and world revolutionary forces and came out with what it called "containment strategy."
					
					The so-called Truman Doctrine spelled out by Truman at a joint meeting of the U.S. Senate and House of Representatives in March 1947 was an open declaration of a war against the socialist forces and the world independent forces and a declaration that called for carrying out its strategy for world domination and "containment strategy" in real earnest.
					
					The proclamation of "Truman Doctrine" and the establishment of the above-said strategy meant that the U.S. launched an "anti-communist crusade expedition."
					
					The U.S. attached importance to the Far East in Asia in carrying out its strategy for dominating the world.
					
					MacArthur, commander of the U.S. forces in Fart East and commander of the UN forces during the three-year Korean War, said at that time that Europe had a dying system but Asia having 800 million population would decide on the advance of the world history in 1 000 years to come, adding that the U.S. will lose the whole world if it fails to put Asia under its control.
					
					The U.S. reactionary government ostensively advocated the policy of putting main emphasis on Europe but it enforced the policy of attaching importance to Asia in practice under the influence of "those advocating Asia first" including MacArthur.
					
					They attached great importance to Korea, in particular, among Asian countries, 
					
					"Top secret document No. 4849" of the Information Research Bureau of the U.S. Department of State on January 28, 1949 said that in the light of Korea's geographical situation in Northeast Asia to control Korea and its people was of value to any other states interested in the Far East and it was beyond any doubt that Korea was very important for the U.S. from the political point of view.
					
					For its military and strategic position of Korea the U.S. regarded it as a strategic stronghold for making a military strike at any region in the Far East and as a " bridgehead" and a "forefront in the Far East" from which to intrude into China and the Far Eastern region of the Soviet Union.
					
					To cite just an example, MacArthur was reported to say that Korea was like a bridgehead leading to the continent and that conquering the whole of Korea would help the U.S. forces cut off the only supply line linking Siberia of the Soviet Union with its southern parts and put the whole areas between Vladivostok and Singapore under the U.S. control.
					
					The U.S. also said Korea was the forefront in the East where it was standing in confrontation with communism and a political and military confrontational hotspot between the East and the West as the north and the south of Korea were taking quite different paths after the end of World War II.
					
					Much upset by the fact that the DPRK was making a leaping advance toward socialism, bringing about epoch-making changes, the U.S. termed Korea an "ideal battle site on which every possible success of the U.S. in Asia might hinge" and a "testing ground for the confrontation between the U.S.-style democracy and communism." 
					
					This finally prompted the U.S. to adopt it as a basic policy toward the DPRK to colonize the whole of Korea by means of war.
					
					The U.S. considered war as an effective lever for bringing down the people's democratic system deeply rooted in the DPRK and imposing aggressive demands upon its people strong in independence. 
					
					The U.S. illegally brought the issue of Korea up for discussion at the UN in autumn of 1947, cooking up the puppet regime in south Korea in 1948 and worked hard to build "Asia's best" puppet army. All this was aimed at meeting these demands.
					
					As seen above, the Korean War was an inevitable product of the U.S. brigandish strategy and policy for aggression toward the DPRK, both aimed to colonize the whole of Korea and realize its scenario for dominating the world in the Far East, using it as an outpost.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blames U.S. for Escalated Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blames U.S. for Escalated Tension on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. summoned the south Korean puppet officials to Washington to hold foreign and defense ministerial talks there.
					At the talks the U.S. cried out for defending south Korea by mobilizing all U.S. military forces, again citing the non-existent "threat" and "provocations" from the DPRK.
					
					They agreed on jointly building a missile shield and stipulated in a joint statement the U.S. sustained provision of the "extended deterrence" to south Korea.
					
					This clearly tells who is chiefly to blame for the escalated tension on the Korean Peninsula as it betrays the U.S. invariable design to stifle the DPRK at any cost by force of arms, with every means and method involved including the use of nukes.
					
					It was none other than the U.S. that openly beefed up armed forces and stepped up moves for a nuclear war against the DPRK in wanton violation of the Armistice Agreement (AA), rendering the situation on the peninsula extremely tense.
					
					It unilaterally declared the abrogation of Paragraph 13 D of the AA and systematically introduced into south Korea more than 1 000 nuclear weapons of various types together with huge quantities of military hardware, thus turning south Korea into the world's biggest nuclear base.
					
					The U.S. concluded the "mutual defense treaty" with south Korea to legalize its troops' presence in south Korea, an open challenge to Paragraph 60, the main provision of the AA which calls for the withdrawal of all foreign forces from the Korean Peninsula and peaceful settlement of the Korean issue.
					
					It also illegally introduced heavy weapons and combatants into demilitarized zone (DMZ) in violation of Paragraphs 6 and 10 of the AA, turning the areas along the Military Demarcation Line into an advanced base for a new war.
					
					The U.S. is becoming evermore frantic in its moves to launch a new war.
					
					Its military has given priority to beefing up its aggression forces in south Korea. Accordingly, huge quantities of new type offensive weapons are being additionally deployed in the units of the U.S. forces.
					
					U.S. units supposed to be transferred to Phyongthaek U.S. base south of the River Han are being relocated in the front areas. The U.S. forces side is closeted with the puppet forces over the issue of keeping the U.S.-south Korea "Combined Forces Command" as it is even after the transfer of the right to command wartime operations to south Korea.
					
					Large-scale joint military exercises are going on one after another.
					
					The U.S. staged a joint military drill together with Japanese and south Korean forces in the South Sea of Korea on June 21 and 22 and a joint naval maneuver with the south Korean forces in the West Sea from June 23 to 25 with nuclear-powered carrier George Washington involved.
					
					On June 22 the U.S. forces staged the largest-ever joint live shell firing in the area south of the DMZ in league with south Korea. In this drill they perpetrated such reckless provocation as firing at the flag of the DPRK.
					
					The situation goes to prove that the U.S. still remains unchanged in its ambition to stifle the DPRK and put the whole Korean Peninsula under its control in a bid to secure a bridgehead for carrying out its strategy for Asian domination. 
					
					This is, however, no more than a daydream.
					
					The DPRK emerged a military power whose military capability is incomparably stronger than what was during the Korean War in the last century.
					
					The U.S. had better not forget the disgrace and defeat it suffered in the war fought against the young DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Ignites Korean War by Abusing UN Name: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Ignites Korean War by Abusing UN Name: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists kicked off the Korean War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) by abusing the UN name, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article.
					The article cited facts to prove that the U.S. imperialists stirred up public opinion to blame the DPRK for the ignition of the war and wound up all the preparations to refer it to the UN in a bid to hurl armed forces of its allies into the war. 
					
					The U.S. imperialists launched the Korean War according to their carefully worked-out scenario for a war against the DPRK, the article said, and went on:
					
					Then to cover up truth they cooked up resolutions of the UN Security Council.
					
					On June 25, two days before the adoption of the June 27, 1950 resolution, the U.S. let the 68th and 339th combat air corps and the 25th combat bomber corps of its Fifth Air Force in Japan fly 163 missions to battlefields of the Korean War. From the afternoon of June 26 they heavily bombed the northern half of Korea and the U.S. 7th Fleet started the military operation in the waters off Korea.
					
					On July 7 the U.S. imperialists let the UK and France submit a resolution to the effect that the U.S. forces' military actions in the DPRK should be conducted under the UN flag which was aimed to put satellite countries under its control. 
					
					The resolution had no phrases as dispatching "UN forces" or setting up "UN command".
					
					Nevertheless, the U.S. imperialists called the "allied forces command" "UN command" and their aggression forces "UN forces" in a bid to justify the UN resolution. 
					
					Next day, they let MacArthur, U.S. commander in Far East, hold a concurrent post as "UN forces commander".
					
					The resolutions cooked up by the U.S. imperialists are a wanton violation of the UN Charter.
					
					At that time, they intentionally excluded the delegate of the DPRK, the country concerned, and invited only the south Korean puppet delegate to the session in a bid to have the resolutions reflecting their demand adopted.
					
					The U.S. maneuvered the UN Security Council into illegally adopting all the resolutions related to the Korean War without the participation of the former Soviet Union, a permanent member of the UNSC.
					
					The present situation suggests that the U.S. may launch armed invasion under the UN flag, by taking advantage of the present international relations, just as it did during the last Korean War. The DPRK will remain unfazed although the U.S. abuses the UN name again, the paper stresses.

articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Demanded
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Tongduchon City Assembly of Kyonggi Province, south Korea released a statement on June 25 demanding the withdrawal of a unit of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea.
					It was reported shortly ago that the U.S. forces in south Korea cancelled the plan to transfer their artillery unit from Tongduchon and informed south Korea of their proposal to keep it there and that the latter is set to accept it. 
					
					In this connection the assembly in a statement demanded the U.S. side pull back the unit and totally return the U.S. military bases to south Korea.
					
					That day members of the assembly paid protest visits to Chongwadae and the office of the "prime minister" to thrust the statement to them. 
					
					Then they staged a demonstration outside the building of the "Ministry of Defense", demanding the cancellation of the U.S. forces' unilateral proposal.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Efforts to Invent Pretext for Invasion of DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Efforts to Invent Pretext for Invasion of DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are running reckless to invent a pretext to invade the DPRK.
					This is illustrated by the joint live shell firing exercise staged on June 22 with a U.S. nuclear-powered carrier involved. It was the largest-ever drill since the end of the Korean War in an armistice. In the drill, south Korean fighters and U.S. gunships fired live shells on the flag of the DPRK.
					
					In this regard, Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary:
					
					The drill is a product of a black-hearted scheme to ignite an all-out war by securing a pretext to invade the DPRK.
					
					The south Korean warmongers claimed that "the live shell firing at the flag was aimed to mark the territory of the enemy".
					
					Their remarks clearly prove that the drill was aimed to strike the DPRK.
					
					The group of traitors made no scruple of committing such a hideous provocation as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, and has put spurs to the moves to unleash a war against the DPRK, far from making an apology for rubbing salt into wound of compatriots who were grieving over the loss of the father of the nation.
					
					They went the lengths of letting the Japanese "Self-Defense Forces" take part in the drills against the DPRK in order to tighten the military nexus with the Japanese reactionaries, the sworn enemy of the Korean nation.
					
					What is worse is that the group openly announced the plan to purchase military hardware from the U.S. to sweep mines in the areas of the DPRK along the Military Demarcation Line as an attempt to clear ways to the DPRK in case of contingency.
					
					Finding themselves in a tight corner, they are making every possible effort to seek a way out of crisis in igniting a war against the DPRK.
					
					This, however, is just a daydream.

articles.title: End to Discrimination against Part-timers Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
End to Discrimination against Part-timers Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Council of the Solidarity for School Part-timers in south Korea on June 23 held a rally in Seoul demanding the abolition of discrimination against part-timers.
					The rally brought together more than 6 000 school part-timers from across south Korea.
					
					Speakers at the rally chided the harsh discrimination against part-timers at schools and the continued unreasonable lay-off.
					
					Expressing irrepressible anger at this serious inequality, they urged the school sides and authorities concerned to take steps for immediately abolishing discrimination against the part-timers and guaranteeing even minimum rights. 
					
					They declared the workers would unite close in their actions.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Works Reported by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Works Reported by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings Ltd., Hong Kong, China on June 20 reported about the main content of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People".
					The work, published on April 20, 2012, deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					It indicates the tasks for firmly defending their ideas and exploits and glorifying them for all ages.
					
					The Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea on June 21 posted the work on its Internet homepage.
					
					The gist of Kim Jong Un's work "Let's Dynamically Struggle for a Final Victory, Holding Aloft the Banner of Songun" was carried by the Russian paper Veteran No. 22.
					
					The speech, made public on April 15, 2012, clarifies that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation is a history which proved an immutable truth that an outstanding leader assures the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					The work indicates tasks for exalting the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully building a thriving socialist country.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in South Africa
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un′s Work Held in South Africa
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" took place in Pretoria, South Africa on June 14.
					Eddie Kekana, chairman of the Group for the Study of the Progressive Ideas of South Africa, said that leader Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into the eternal party of President Kim Il Sung and the invincible party enjoying absolute support and confidence from the Korean people.
					
					Progressive people wholeheartedly revere Kim Jong Il, who wisely led the struggle of the WPK, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, he said, and went on:
					
					Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his work stressed the need to steadily develop the WPK into the glorious party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					His work gives perfect answers to the problems arising in fulfilling the revolutionary moral obligation to preceding leaders.
					
					The work reflects the unanimous will and desire of the Korean people and other world progressives.
					
					The WPK will further develop into an invincible party successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Jong Il in idea, leadership and virtue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Praised by Foreigners
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries to mark the 48th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					Lectures, book and photo exhibitions, film shows and seminars on the exploits took place in Norway and India from June 12 to 19.
					
					At the events personages of those countries praised the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in party building.
					
					The chairman of the Communist Party of Norway said in a lecture that Kim Jong Il made sure that the idea of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the WPK, was taken as the guiding idea of the party.
					
					Balzor Singh Chauhan, chairman of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, said in his speech that Kim Jong Il performed great exploits in party building while leading the WPK for nearly half a century.
					
					S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, said that the WPK could steadily develop into a veteran and experienced ever-victorious party vigorously advancing along the road of socialism without an error or deviation in shaping line, enjoying absolute support and trust of the popular masses, as it was led by Kim Jong Il.
					
					The director of a company of India said that the 4th Conference of the WPK decided to hold him as its eternal general secretary, adding this clearly demonstrated before the international community that his idea and cause will be ever-lasting.

articles.title: Intensified Friendship, Solidarity with DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Intensified Friendship, Solidarity with DPRK Called for
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- We will in the future, too, give wide publicity to the struggle of the Korean people to build socialism and reunify the country among the people of the Czech Republic and further strengthen friendship and solidarity with the DPRK. The chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said this at a friendship meeting held in Prague on June 21 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of the association.
					He recollected with pride the positive friendship and solidarity activities with the Korean people the association has conducted for two decades, the chairman noted, and went on:
					
					The activities of the association would be unthinkable without the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					With clear insight into the destiny of socialism in the East European countries, the President led the DPRK to unswervingly follow the path of socialism in line with firm independent policy. 
					
					Kim Jong Il steadily developed and enriched the Juche idea founded by the President, shattered the vicious moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK and defended socialism with his Songun politics.
					
					Today the Korean people are pushing forward the building of a thriving nation under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Spokesman for Chinese Foreign Ministry Dismisses S. Korean Media's Misinformation
articles.content:
Spokesman for Chinese Foreign Ministry Dismisses S. Korean Media's Misinformation
Beijing June 26 (KCNA) -- Hong Lei, a spokesman for the Chinese Foreign Ministry, answered a question put by Phoenix Satellite TV Holdings Ltd., Hong Kong, China as regards a Korean issue at a regular press briefing in Beijing on June 26.
					He dismissed south Korean media's report that the Chinese government suspended an agreement on Hwanggumphyong between China and the DPRK. 
					
					The relations of cooperation in the economy and trade between China and the DPRK are favorably developing and the plan on Hwanggumphyong and an agreement on two economic zones are being regularly promoted at present, he noted, adding that what the media concerned reported is totally unfounded and irresponsible.

articles.title: U.S. Does Not Want Detente in Korea: Russian Radio
articles.content:
U.S. Does Not Want Detente in Korea: Russian Radio
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Voice of Russia aired the following report as regards another grave provocation the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of south Korea perpetrated by violating the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK:
					The joint military drill staged by the U.S. and south Korea last weekend did not have a good impact on the situation of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					According to a report of south Korea, the DPRK flag was used as the target in the drill. Evidently, this was staged for a propaganda purpose, not for any technical one. Its objective was to provoke the DPRK and demonstrate its "muscle and determination".
					
					According to observers, the period of the drill was also set to get on the nerves of the DPRK. The drill was kicked off in the run-up to the 62nd anniversary of the start of the Korean War.
					
					Meanwhile, the south Korea-U.S. joint military maneuver was staged for three days in the West Sea of Korea with nuclear-powered carrier George Washington involved.
					
					The vice-chief of the Center for Korean Studies of the Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Sciences said that the U.S. is fanning up the dispute between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					He went on:
					
					"South Korea, in particular, is escalating the tension. The U.S. is escalating the tension, while taking steps which indicate that it does not wish to see tension defused under the present situation." 
					
					The firing at the DPRK flag is dashing the hope that the six-party talks would be resumed soon though they take not an easy course.

articles.title: Voice of Russia Accuses Japan of Moving toward Militarism
articles.content:
Voice of Russia Accuses Japan of Moving toward Militarism
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Voice of Russia aired the following report as regards Japan's moves to justify its nuclear and space weaponization:
					The Japanese Diet has revised the basic law on nuclear energy. This paved the way for Japan's use of nuclear energy for its security. It was stipulated in the law that nuclear energy should be used for peaceful purposes only.
					
					The revision of the law was not confined to the nuclear field only. Japan deleted from the law on the research into outer space the provision stipulating that the research should be conducted for peaceful purposes only.
					
					This tells that Japan may use outer space for its military purposes.
					
					The revision of the law passed by the Japanese Diet is quite contrary to the three non-nuclear principles that ban the country from possessing, producing or allowing nuclear weapons on its territory.
					
					Expert Valery Kistanov said Japan is moving towards militarism.
					
					He went on:
					
					The recent decision made by the Japanese Diet shows that Japan is not pinning a great hope on the U.S. protection. Japan has technological conditions enough to produce nuclear weapons. It might have stockpiled fissionable materials sufficient enough to produce nuclear weapons, given its highly developed nuclear industry.

articles.title: UN Abused by U.S. in Korean War
articles.content:
UN Abused by U.S. in Korean War
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The United States made a mockery of the United Nations in the Korean War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					On June 25, 1950, the U.S. imperialists started the Korean War and, at the same time, had UN Resolution No. 82 railroaded through the UN Security Council, which suggested unreasonably shifting the blame for the outbreak of the war on to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					On June 27, they had UN Resolution No. 83 adopted to "legitimate" their armed intervention.
					
					On July 7, UN Resolution No. 84 was adopted to allow troops of the United States and its allies to take part in the war under the name of "UN forces" to be commanded by the U.S.
					
					The resolutions were totally contrary to the UN Charter as they were adopted in the absence of a party to the dispute, without any detailed investigation into it.
					
					Article 32 of the UN Charter says: "Any member of the Untied Nations which is not a member of the Security Council or any state which is not a member of the United Nations, if it is a party to a dispute under consideration by the Security Council, shall be invited to participate, without vote, in the discussion relating to the dispute."
					
					Former USSR Foreign Minister A. A. Gromyko, in a telegram to the then UN secretary general, said that UN Resolution No. 84 (1950) had no legality as it was adopted without presence of the Soviet Union and mainland China, though any UN resolution would take effect when it gets full approval from the seven members of the UNSC including the five permanent members.
					
					The resolution is a flagrant violation of the UN Charter, and it allows the UN flag to be used as a mask to cover up the aggressive nature of the U.S. military actions against the Korean people, he added.
					
					Clark, former commander of the "UN forces" in Korea, said in March 1967 that he had not received any instruction from the United Nations during the Korean War.
					
					His confession showed that the command over of the "UN forces" was in the hands of the United States in contrary to the control system and principles of activities of UN forces.
					
					On January 31, 1951, the UN Security Council adopted Resolution No. 90, which called for withdrawing from the UNSC list of discussions the agenda item on the Korean War, brought up by the United States on June 25, 1950. Hence it had no longer dealt with the Korean issue.
					
					This meant that the UNSC itself recognized the invalidity of all its "resolutions" concerning the Korean War.

articles.title: U.S., Abuser of Human Rights
articles.content:
U.S., Abuser of Human Rights
Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean War (June 1950-July 1953), started by the U.S., showed that the U.S. imperialists were the worst murderer in the world.
					In the war the U.S. imperialists slaughtered many innocent Koreans in a cruel and brutal way beyond human imagination.
					
					During the temporary strategic retreat of the Korean People's Army, they killed at least 120 000 inhabitants in Hwanghae Province (at that time), more than 35 000 in Sinchon County alone.
					
					The killers hammered nails on skulls of civilians, cut off their heads with saw and hung them upside down to set fire to their heads. Not content with such cruel way, they gouged out eyeballs of people and skinned them alive.
					
					The U.S. troops used warplanes and heavy weapons to kill more than 400 civilians in the area of Rogun-ri, Yongdong County, North Chungchong Province.
					
					Survivors at that time testified to the fact that the U.S. troops played with their lives like with insects.
					
					The U.S. imperialists murdered more than 1 300 civilians the very day when they landed in Inchon in September 1950.
					
					800 odd civilians including women and children were killed in Hungjae-dong on the outskirts of Seoul in one day alone.
					
					A journalist of New York Times who witnessed the massacre reported that aged persons, women, youths and children, carried by trucks, were brought to a hollow to be turned into grave and were shot to death by MPs firing rifles and machine guns.
					
					The thrice-cursed crimes, committed by the U.S. imperialists against the Korean people, should be atoned for at any cost.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Sh. Shabdolov
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Sh. Shabdolov
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 18 el presidente del Partido Comunista de Tadjikistan Sh. Shabdolov en ocasion del 48o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					El mas estimado camarada Kim Jong Un,
					
					Los miembros del Partido Comunista de Tadjikistan aprecian altamente las grandes hazanas realizadas por el camarada Kim Jong Il en el movimiento comunista del mundo.
					
					En el pasado, el Dirigente dirigio sabiamente el partido y el gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea trabajando en el CC del PTC.
					
					Camarada Kim Jong Un,
					
					Con motivo de este dia significativo, felicitamos a Vd. y le deseamos mayores exitos en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria.
					
					Con alta consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Alberto Gutierrez
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Alberto Gutierrez
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 19 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinador del Comite de Coordinacion Nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico, en ocasion del 48o aniversario del inicio del trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					En su mensaje, el remitente rindio el maximo homenaje al Dirigente Kim Jong Il en nombre de todos los militantes del PTM con motivo de esa efemeride significativa.
					
					Afirmo que el Dirigente fue politico veterano de talla mundial quien dirigio a la victoria la causa revolucionaria del Juche, iniciada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, y realizo grandes hazanas en la defensa de la paz y estabilidad del mundo.
					
					Deseo sinceramente al destinatario grandes exitos en su noble labor para dirigir la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de verificacion de la independencia en el mundo.

articles.title: Corea y China establecen imprenta asociada
articles.content:
Corea y China establecen imprenta asociada
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- "La Imprenta Asociada Tongbaek de Corea es una flor de camelia roja florecida en el jardin de amistad Corea-China".
					Dijo asi Choe Kyong Guk, director y redactor en jefe de las Ediciones en Lenguas Extranjeras de Corea, en la ceremonia inaugural de la Imprenta efectuada el dia 25 en esta capital.
					
					La fabrica fue establecida por las Ediciones en Lenguas Extranjeras de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Compania Limitada de Inversiones Internacionales de Hong Kong de Yongli Oriental y la Compania Limitada Zhongcai de Jiangsu de la Republica Popular China.
					
					La fabrica produce y vende por si solo en el interior de la RPDC los impresos para la prevencion de falsificacion y en placas de vinilo y laminas en relieve y diversas marcas y realiza la importacion y exportacion y las actividades de administracion comercial de los materiales de distintas publicaciones e impresos.
					
					Se esforzara por satisfacer la demanda  domestica y recibira activamente la peticion del mercado internacional.
					
					Choe manifesto la voluntad de ejecutar cabalmente articulos acordados mediante la negociacion amistosa a base de la ley de asociacion, la regla de su ejecucion y las demas leyes interesadas de la RPDC y en el principio de igualdad y beneficio mutuo.
					
					Agrego que asegurara el credito y el interes economico en las actividades administrativas, de modo que contribuira al desarrollo de publicacion e impresion del pais.
					
					La fabrica tiene dos pisos: en el primero estan desplegados los equipos de produccion y en el segundo las salas de examen de articulos y las oficinas.
					
					La imprenta esta situada en el capitalino municipio de Sosong.

articles.title: Efectuado juego de amistad de futbol entre Corea y China
articles.content:
Efectuado juego de amistad de futbol entre Corea y China
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 26 en el capitalino Campo de Futbol Yanggakdo el juego de amistad entre los equipos futbolisticos sub-19 de Corea y China.
					En la ocasion ambos equipos quedaron empatados por tres goles.
					
					Dos equipos participaran en el Campeonato Asiatico de Futbol sub-19 de 2012.
					
					El once coreano pertenece al grupo C de eliminatoria junto con las selecciones de Jordania, Vietnam y Uzbekistan.
					
					El equipo chino pertenece al grupo B.
					
					Por otra parte, el once chino vencio el dia 23 al coreano Taesongsan por 2 a 0.

articles.title: EE.UU no puede ocultar su identidad de provocador de guerra (1)
articles.content:
EE.UU no puede ocultar su identidad de provocador de guerra (1)
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- Ya transcurrieron 62 anos desde cuando Estados Unidos desato la guerra coreana. 
					Esta, estallada el 25 de junio de 1950, hizo sufrir al pueblo coreano incontables desgracias y penas y enormes perdidas humanas y materiales.
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. continua hoy tambien con su campana para atropellar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tergiversando la verdad de la historia. 
					
					Es un acto estupido para liberarse de la responsabilidad de provocacion de la guerra coreana y realizar su ambicion dominacionista.
					
					Los hechos historicos ponen al desnudo a todo el mundo la naturaleza de Estados Unidos como provocador y criminal de la guerra coreana.
						
					
					Producto inevitable de la estrategia de hegemonia mundial
						
					
					La guerra coreana fue producto inevitable de la estrategia de Estados Unidos para dominar el mundo. Especificamente, devino la continuacion de su politica exterior de caracter agresivo y su resultado directo.
					
					Aprovechando su posicion favorable de caudillo de los imperialistas que ocupo despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, Estados Unidos presento como su meta estrategica de su inminente politica exterior la "direccion sobre el mundo" y la toma de hegemonia mundial.
					
					En su mensaje enviado el 19 de diciembre de 1945 al Congreso, el entonces presidente estadounidense Truman parloteo que EE.UU. debe asumir con gusto la mision de "dirigir al mundo" agregando que "ellos (los norteamericanos) pudieron recibir la posicion directiva que quiso concederles el presidente Wilson despues de la Primera Guerra Mundial".
					
					Para realizar su ambicion, el imperio declaro la guerra fria contra los paises socialistas y las fuerzas revolucionarias del mundo en pleno crecimiento y presento ademas la llamada "estrategia de contencion".
					
					La "Doctrina Truman", publicada por este en marzo de 1947 en la reunion conjunta bicameral del Congreso, fue la abierta declaracion de guerra contra las fuerzas socialistas y las independientes del mundo, la cual anuncio el cumplimiento de la estrategia de dominar el mundo y "la de contencion".
					
					Ese suceso significo el inicio de la "cruzada anticomunista" con miras a la hegemonia mundial. 
						
					
					Asia primero, Europa despues. Y Corea sobre todo.
						
					
					EEE.UU. concede importancia a Asia, en particular, al Extremo Oriente en el cumplimiento de su estrategia de heguemonia mundial.
					
					MacArthur decia entonces que Europa es "sistema que va muriendo", pero Asia con una poblacion de 800 millones "determinara el avance de la historia del mundo en los proximos mil anos", opinando que  si EE.UU. no logra tomar a Asia, perderia el mundo entero.
					
					El gobierno reaccionario estadounidense abogo aparentemente por el centralismo de Europa, pero en realidad, se inclino a la politica de apreciar a Asia dejandose llevar por "los que dan primacia a Asia", inclusive MacArthur.
					
					Corea era la manzana que apetecia mas al imperio.
					
					En el "documento supersecreto no. 4849" de la oficina de investigacion de informaciones del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. fechado 28 de enero de 1949, se lee que "Por la posicion geografica de Corea en el Nordeste Asiatico, vale la pena a cualquier Estado, interesado en el Extremo Oriente, controlar ese pais y su pueblo" y "es indudable la importancia politica de Corea para EE.UU.".
					
					La posicion estrategica militar de Corea es tan favorable que hizo a EE.UU. verla como "base estrategica" para dar ataque militar a cualquier region del Extremo Oriente y como "puente" y "linea avanzada en el Extremo Oriente" desde donde se puede lanzar la invasion contra China y el Extremo Oriente de la ex Union Sovietica.
					
					Por ejemplo, MacArthur habia dicho que si se logra ocupar todo el territorio de "Corea, puente al continente", se puede "cortar la unica linea de abastecimiento que conecta a Siberia de la Union Sovietica con la region sur de Asia, … Dominar toda la zona entre Vladivostok y Singapur".
					
					Ademas, puesto que despues de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, el Norte y el Sur de Corea construian sistemas sociales diametralmente opuestos, EE.UU. describia a Corea como linea avanzada en el Oriente donde se enfrenta con el comunismo y como punto de enfrentamiento politico y militar entre el Oriente y el Occidente.
					
					Temiendo a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que se desarrolla vertiginosamente hacia el socialismo logrando cambios seculares despues de la liberacion (15 de agosto de 1945), definio a Corea como "campo de batalla de ideales que quizas determine todos los exitos de EE.UU. en Asia" y "lugar de ensayo de confrontacion entre la democracia al estilo norteamericano y el comunismo".
					
					Al fin, EE.UU. llego a elegir como fundamento de su politica sobre Corea colonizar a toda Corea con el metodo de guerra.
					
					Considero que la guerra es el unico medio eficaz para derrocar el regimen popular democratico arraigado profundamente en la parte norte de Corea e imponer al pueblo de esta muy independiente sus demandas de bandido.
					
					Partiendo de esta demanda, el imperio remitio ilegalmente el problema coreano a la ONU en otono de 1947, fundo el regimen titere surcoreano en 1948 y se esforzo mucho por organizar el ejercito surcoreano como el "primero de Asia".
					
					Asi la guerra coreana fue producto inevitable de la estrategia bandidesca y la politica agresiva a Corea de EE.UU., encaminadas a colonizar a toda Corea y cumplir el plan de heguemonia mundial en el Extremo Oriente tomandola como base avanzada.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena simulacro de tiro de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena simulacro de tiro de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 27 de junio (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual de este miercoles, el periodico Minju Joson denuncio a las autoridades surcoreanas que se entregan a preparar el pretexto de la agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Por ejemplo, en los ejercicios conjuntos de tiro de gran envergadura despues de la pasada guerra coreana desarrollados el dia 22 con la participacion del portaaviones nuclear de Estados Unidos, los aviones de combate del ejercito titere y los helicopteros de ataque de las tropas norteamericanas dispararon freneticamente tomando la bandera de la RPDC como blanco, senala el comentario y prosigue:
					
					Esto es el producto del intento malsano de desatar la guerra total al preparar el pretexto para la agresion a la RPDC.
					
					Ahora los belicistas titeres hablan de que el tiro contra la bandera de la RPDC "es para marcar el territorio del enemigo".
					
					A traves de ello revelaron por si mismos que el presente entrenamiento es para atacar a la RPDC.
					
					Los compinches traidores, que insultaron a su connacional RPDC durante el gran duelo nacional, no pidieron disculpas por esto, al contrario vinieron  recurriendose a las maniobras de provocacion de la guerra de agresion al Norte y calumniando la dignidad maxima de la RPDC.
					
					Recientemente introdujeron hasta las "fuerzas de autodefensa" de Japon en los ejercicios belicos intensificando el contubernio militar con los reaccionarios japoneses, enemigos jurados.
					
					Incluso hablan tanto de que introduciran los equipos belicos norteamericanos para abrir la ruta de agresion al Norte al eliminar en el tiempo de emergencia las minas sembradas en la parte de la RPDC de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar.
					
					La horda del traidor Lee Myung Bak, caida en el aprieto, pretende buscar vanamente la salida de la crisis en provocar la guerra de agresion al Norte.
